tool_description: Introducing Tags Generator, your go-to API for effortless tag retrieval on YouTube and TikTok. Seamlessly obtain relevant tags using queries, titles, or keywords to enhance content discoverability. Perfect for developers, organizations, and content creators seeking a hassle-free solution for tag optimization
name: Tags Generator
title: Tags Generator

api_list.name: Get TikTok Tags
api_list.description:
### Endpoint: `/tiktokTags/:query`

Retrieve TikTok tags related to the query "baby dance".

#### Request
- Method: `GET`
- Endpoint: `/tiktokTags/baby dance`

#### Response
The API returns an object containing the query and an array of related TikTok tags.

- `query` (string): The original query for which tags are fetched.
- `tags` (array of strings): An array containing TikTok tags related to the query.

#### Sample Response
```json
{
  "data": {
    "query": "baby dance",
    "tags": [
      "#babydance",
      "#babydancescoobydoopapa",
      "#babysongs",
      "#baby",
      "#babydancevideos",
      "#kidsdance",
      "#babyboss-dance",
      "#dance",
      "#babysharkdance",
      "#babyshark",
      "#babysong"
    ]
  }
}
```
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tags-generator.p.rapidapi.com/tiktokTags/baby dance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tags-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tags-generator.p.rapidapi.com/tiktokTags/{query}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tags-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Youtube Tags
api_list.url: https://tags-generator.p.rapidapi.com/youtubeTags/ Shark Tank US | Sharks Are Shocked At The Cost Of The Smart Tire Company
api_list.description:
### Endpoint: `/youtubeTags/:query `

Retrieve YouTube tags related to the video titled "Shark Tank US | Sharks Are Shocked At The Cost Of The Smart Tire Company".

#### Request
- Method: `GET`
- Endpoint: `/youtubeTags/Shark Tank US | Sharks Are Shocked At The Cost Of The Smart Tire Company `

#### Response
The API returns an object containing the query and an array of related YouTube tags.

- `query` (string): The original query for which tags are fetched.
- `tags` (array of strings): An array containing YouTube tags related to the query.

#### Sample Response
```json
{
  "data": {
    "query": "Shark Tank US | Sharks Are Shocked At The Cost Of The Smart Tire Company",
    "tags": [
      "shark tank",
      "shark tank us",
      "mark shark tank",
      "shark tank australia",
      "shark tank bad pitches",
      "shark tank best pitches",
      "shark tank usa",
      "kevin shark tank",
      "shark tank pitches",
      "lori shark tank",
      "shark tank covid",
      "american shark tank",
      "daymond shark tank",
      "shark tank season 12",
      "shark tank america",
      "shark tank moments",
      "shark tank best pitch",
      "shark tank pitch",
      "shark tank deals",
      "shark tank guest shark",
      "shark tank season 14",
      "shark tank season 13 pitches",
      "shark tank season 13"
    ]
  }
}
```

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.default: Shark Tank US | Sharks Are Shocked At The Cost Of The Smart Tire Company

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tags-generator.p.rapidapi.com/youtubeTags/ Shark Tank US | Sharks Are Shocked At The Cost Of The Smart Tire Company "

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tags-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
